minigame.title: Source Radar
minigame.prompt: You see a news snippet that cites 'government officials' but doesn't name them or link to original documents. How would you rate its reliability?
minigame.explanation: This shows some transparency (citing sources) but lacks full accountability (no names or links). It's not terrible, but not ideal either.

creator_challenge.title: Build Your Sharing Checklist
creator_challenge.instructions: Draft a 5-step checklist you'll use before sharing a headline or article on social media. Consider what you'll look for to verify reliability, check for bias, and avoid spreading misinformation. Submit your checklist as your artifact.
